pr_title: Enable scratch space limit self tuning when swap is not available

timeline.bodyText: Maybe this code should stay in the early processing of options (fePreProcess) since it sets an option
timeline.author: mpirvu

timeline.message:
Enable scratch space limit self tuning when swap is not available

Enable TR_SelfTuningScratchMemoryUsageBeforeCompile option when
swap space is not available.

Fixes: #9616

Signed-off-by: Ashutosh Mehra <mehra.ashutosh@ibm.com>

Enable scratch space limit self tuning when swap is not available

Enable TR_SelfTuningScratchMemoryUsageBeforeCompile option when
swap space is not available.

Fixes: #9616

Signed-off-by: Ashutosh Mehra <mehra.ashutosh@ibm.com>
